divs: Sighting DetailsSaw redish light in distance between Jenny Lind area and Lodi. Light was almost still and just over the horizon, and slowly lowering. Upon viewing in scope it looked like it twice shifted to a half sphere with lights on the bottom edge. (not a great scope) It descended slowly until its view was blocked by a hill. Looked to be about half way to Lodi at the edge of where the foothills start. No rapid movements. No blinking lights. Too large to be a helicopter and too slow for an airplane.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Valley Springs
There were no other sightings in Valley Springs on or around January 26th 2009
